content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-01-30 #21280 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in .

Just renaming, plus the fact that I outright deleted MathlibTest/CountHeartbeats.lean because it is counting exact numbers of heartbeats and gets in the way of Lean development. I'm happy if someone wants to restore something more flexible later.
#21251 is a PR that allows for approximate heartbeat counts and uses it in the tests.
Thanks, I've merged this into nightly-testing and #21280.
I'm confused why the diff is so large. I merged master into both the source and target branch of the PR...
The missing step may be to merge bump/v4.17.0 into bump/nightly-2025-01-30.
aah, of course :man_facepalming: let me do that
